edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method

Class RecursiveThresholdingMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method.Method
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method.RecursiveThresholdingMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RecursiveThresholdingMethod
extends Method
    Implements the recursive Otsu thresholding method described in Xiong et al. (DOI: 10.1109/ICIP.2006.312365).

    The quantification for each resulting regions uses an IntensityPerPixelMetric.

    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Method Detail

      • go

        public void go()
        Runs the method on the stored images and parameters. As per the specification in the Method class, this applies the segmentation method to the first in the set of images, and quantifies the remainder of them.
        Specified by:
        go in class Method
